title: I asked the jungler to switch his role with me.

replies.body: I still wouldn't trade lol
who am I kidding nobody wants to trade support

> [{quoted}](name=Big Lincoln,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ciI5PFsZ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-01T15:19:36.998+0000)
>
> who am I kidding nobody wants to trade support

I did before. Didn't expect to get jungle. Support said he was confident in his jungle ability. Huge mistake, he was a bad jungler.
Feels Support man https://openclipart.org/image/2400px/svg_to_png/222252/feels.png

I traded it yesterday and won.

Conclusion:Support mains do.
what if i added a ''You're the nicest guy on earth. I'll share with you my food''
{{champion:29}} What's "sharing"?
{{champion:107}} NO
Rude.
I would if it counts for anything.
Sounds like you did the science, but with a sample size of one the Oxford Player Database has to pass on your study until further work is done.

>

To follow this up and to aid in this research... please send me and Doc Jarvis as many Strawberries as you possibly can.
http://i.imgur.com/Edbu4.jpg
Upvoted for Firefly.
Was quite curious at what insanity i would find when i clicked on this, pleasantly surprised ggwp

Excuse me, are you assuming my preference of friut?
https://media.tenor.co/images/509c94f2c6a3c9635e33abd6b0e67ac7/raw
Good thing strawberries are.. nuts.
Good thing nuts are fruits.
TIL Nuts are fucking fruits, me being the "know it all dude" all my life, getting education in a League forum.

Lmao earlier today someone asked can I jg (i had jg) and I didn't have the client up so then our top laner said "MMM let me think" "Yes sure" and then I came back and read chat I was like "??????????????????????????????????????" "I am jungle" "??????????????"
When that happens, just take your role, watch as your smite abilities are better, steal all camps. Then report after game.
I used to trade roles with teammates. They always fed. Never again

Gave someone Draven, they go 1/5 and afk. Friend gave someone Brand, they went 0/14 (They had 5 kills, but three were my kills, and 2 were my friend's, all he did was ult when they had 50 hp or less for the kills) Never give someone your role or your champion, they will KS you, preventing you from snowballing, or getting gold. I and my duo queue partner have only been asked twice, and both times they fed and blamed us. The Brand game was also ranked lol.

I am so confident in my jungling ability I only trade every time someones asks me :). 

Had a good Annie mid game last night though so didn't feel too bad :).
and you're a child
